metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10729 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Amanda 3.3.1. A user with backup privileges cantrivially compromise a client installation. The "runtar" setuid root binarydoes not check for additional arguments supplied after --create, allowingusers to manipulate commands and perform command injection as root.

criterions.comment: amanda: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
